project_descr: Extending the Coastal Forest Protected Area Subsystem in Tanzania.

outputs.output_descr: Working in collaboration with the Government, largely through the forest sector, WWF and other NGOs; to strengthen overall conservation and management of the Coastal Forests of Tanzania, focusing on both Zanzibar and three priority landscapes in south-eastern Tanzania. The project is designed to run for four years through National Execution Modalities, with government sub-contracting WWF to undertake some specific functions. The project will increase the extent of Protected Areas, upgrade key areas to higher status and seek innovative funding mechanisms for the Hot-Spot.  Carbon offers some op

project_title: extending  the coastal forests protected areas subsystem
